body:
Comment 1: 
Go 1.1 series isn't supported anymore (e.g. we won't release Go 1.1.3),
The latest release (Go 1.2) does point to doc/install-source.html in $GOROOT/README.

As a suggestion, fink should try package the latest version instead the outdated
Go 1.1.2 (which doesn't compile on latest OS X, and lacks a lot of enhancements
made in Go 1.2 development cycle)
_Status changed to **Duplicate**._ _Merged into issue #6783._
